original_text: and said, “Get up, take the child and his mother and go to the land of Israel, for those who were trying to take the child’s life are dead.”
korean_text: 일어나 아기와 그의 어머니를 데리고 이스라엘 땅으로 가라 아기의 목숨을 찾던 자들이 죽었느니라 하시니

sentences.original_text: take the child and his mother
and go to the land of Israel
for those who were trying to take the child's life
sentences.korean_translation: 그 아이의 목숨을 해하려 하던 자들이
